text: as host, in which capacity he held a reception tonight in Accra's Ambassador Hotel. POLICE, on direct orders from the Cabinet, are openly intimidating members of Earl Russell's nuclear-disarming Committee of 100, the Committee claimed yesterday. It said pressure was being put on members and associates all over the country.
